website_summaries.verdict: Between their classic comic designs, superior level of detail, and many points of articulation, this 3-pack of action figures is a must-own for any X-Men fan.
pros: Includes Magneto, Scarlet Witch, and Quicksilver figures
Swappable heads, hands, and mutant power accessories
cons: A fairly expensive trio of classic Marvel characters

customer_reviews.title: Family
customer_reviews.text: Great figures, Quicksilver is good with extra hands, wish the hair was closer to white than gray. Magneto is close to the Apocalpse wave repaint, nice extra head, hands and effects; the cape makes it a little difficult to stand. Scarlet With nice face new face, no heels able to stand much easier. The same effects from the MCU Scarlet Witch ( arm wraps ) Great set.
customer_reviews.author: Litch

customer_reviews.title: A classic Marvel family box set
customer_reviews.text: I got this during a deal day on Amazon and was excited to get a great deal on it. It is a very straight up rendition of one of the Marvel family legacies, depending on who and when the story telling is being done. Are they still related or not related anymore? I would have been more stoked if Quicksilver was in his traditional first appearance green instead of blue costume but am thrilled to have him none the less. Maybe Marvel will correct that with another set and include his now ex-wife Crystal of the Inhumans who STILL has never been presented and include their daughter Luna and Maybe Lockjaw. Now that would be amazing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dar

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great articulation from all three figures. Yeah get three figures in a pack. If you didn't own thses in past they are worth getting now. Great for xmen collectors and marvel legends collector's edition... Con: my magneto had a black scuff on his helmet. Reused marvel legends effects pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond JTop Contributor: Action Figures

customer_reviews.title: Nice figs
customer_reviews.text: I like this set. As a Marvel Legends collector I felt like it was a good release. I collect in box so I cant speak much of the articulations etc. but I do like them. As always, I feel like they are priced high. Back in the 80's and 90's if figures cost this much my parents would have gotten me none. Hell, I remember Micro Machines were pricey for what they were too. Remember when Super Nintendo games cost like $70? WTF....Nostalgia
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Scarlet Witch is perfect, and Quicksilver is just about perfect. The only one I have any complaints with is the Magneto figure, whose head sits at a bothersome height in relation to the helmet on his head. I am only commenting on how noticabely high the helmet sits on his head, as though Magneto is hiding an entire packet of ramen noodles on top of his forehead. Otherwise, excellent package and a sound purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice collection but has QC issues
customer_reviews.text: I preordered this set as soon as it became available and it arrived a week earlier than the release date. I was really excited to get it. Overall, I am happy with my purchase, but the figures I received have some issues. Magneto’s upper thighs looked like they were chewed up during assembly, and Quicksilver’s hair isn’t aligned very well with his face. Despite those issues, it is a nice set. I like this version of Magneto better than the recently released Marvel Now! figure, despite them sharing the same body mold, because I prefer the red and purple color scheme. Magneto also comes with two new head sculpts that are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: The Marvel legends Magneto we've waited for
customer_reviews.text: Finally the definitive Marvel legends Magneto figure Xmen fans been longing for. I feel Quicksilver and Scarlet Witch are much welcome addition for those that have these figures in their Marvel legends collections. @ $20 a figure, this is a great way to upgrade your Marvel action figure collections. Highly recommend set, thanks again Hasbro for listening to your consumers
customer_reviews.author: R. Sessoms

customer_reviews.title: Packaged in a way  that hurts the figures
customer_reviews.text: The inner packaging is designed in a way that can easily harm figures with capes. The capes are made of a soft rubbery material and the inner plastic bubble's edges cut into the rubber capes as you remove them from the package. Could not remove such figures without carefully cutting the plastic bubble to shreds first.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: A Marvelous X-Men Must Have!!️
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Magnetic presentation . Hasbro has outdone themselves with this Marvel Legends X-Men 3 Pack . Package Presentation goes a long way & this one went right out the park . Going , Going !!️ It’s a “Home Run “ for me . Highly recommend for any Marvel Legends collectors or even for the faint at heart collectors ...... Excelsior !!️🔥🔥
customer_reviews.author: wilfredo castillo

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect updated figures much needed for collectors! This pack is also very well priced at the time that I purchased it and hopefully it stays at fair price. Comes with a lot of accessories for each character. Definitely recommend pick it up
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great Magneto figure
customer_reviews.text: They are all very detailed figures but I only got it for Magneto, what an expensive Magneto and amazing Magneto, his children look good aswell but if you want the very original comic version of Magneto, this is an amazing Magneto, later I will take better pictures of each figures but 60 is a good deal for all 3 of em.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful Amazon Exclusive 3-Pack Marvel Legends set
customer_reviews.text: A great Amazon Exclusive 3-pack set from Marvel Legends Collection. Hasbro does it again with this amazing-Family Matters set containing 3 -6 inch scale figures- Magneto , Quicksilver and the Scarlet Witch . A great addition to your Marvel Legends Collection
customer_reviews.author: David C Packard II

customer_reviews.title: Great three pack!
customer_reviews.text: Three characters I was waiting to get for a while. Magneto is amazing and the version everyone wanted. I missed out on the old quicksilver and this one is great. Scarlet witch has a beautiful face skulpt and cool effects
customer_reviews.author: Daivd Marcum

customer_reviews.title: XMen Figures!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this 3 pack! Preordered it back in february and I like it! Its not perfect but I think its a good buy. These are 3 characters Ive never had in my collection so I am glad to finally have them. A few issues with quicksilver and magneto but the price is good and overall im happy with this set.
customer_reviews.author: CelticFan34

customer_reviews.title: swapped items
customer_reviews.text: The item came with accesories not as presented such as magnetos accesories missing, quick silvers hands swapped with others, scarlet whitch effect missing
customer_reviews.author: M. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: awesome marvel legends three pack.
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge marvel legends fan I've bought a lot of them. I've wanted a scarlet witch for a while and I have her I can say she is awesome but I do have one complaint about magneto he's cool and his suit is great but my complaint is the helmet on one of his heads sticks up making it seem his head is a weird shape .
customer_reviews.author: tori Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Family
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my boyfriend, he loved it. You can’t really move Scarlet Witch’s head because of the hair. So her head is basically only facing forward.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: Great figs
customer_reviews.text: Awesome family pack. Feel like the price point should've been around $80+ but very nice price point. All figures were fine without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Yakuzanese

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was everything I hoped it would be! Pietro’s sculpt looks better in person. Now I’ll just have to get a Polaris :) Now, if only Marvel would fix that certain Axis retcon...
customer_reviews.author: CaptainAmyrica

customer_reviews.title: Family value(s)
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Finally the magneto we need. Quicksilver is awesome and scarlet witch looks great. If you’re an xmen fan, avengers and x factor fan, you got some holes plugged up in your collection. I would like some different power effects! They are all the same. Get the havok and Polaris set and you got the whole family

customer_reviews.title: What's with the paint?
customer_reviews.text: This is a good 3 pack, but there are paint application issues with all 3. Not major, but pretty noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Pupu Zulu Zambuquietesenondipointrausers

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got for the scarlet witch. Amazing face sculpt. Very pretty! The magneto default head sculpt looks like a little kid wearing the helmet,lol. I wont use that head. But overall... it was worth getting
customer_reviews.author: Andre'

customer_reviews.title: Meh... Missing Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Kid, the character in the middle was missing his cape. Seems like for the price it shouldn't be missing anything, and should come complete.

customer_reviews.title: MAGNETO!!!!!!  WOW!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Magneto is the bread and butter of this 3 pack and it's a REMARKABLE masterpiece! EPIC! TOTALLY WORTH EVERY CENT SPENT!

customer_reviews.title: Great presentation
customer_reviews.text: I had to add this set to my Legends collection. The presentation box is great and the figures are very well done. Lots of detail to each figure!

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited! Excellent shape and condition. Well packaged. Exactly what we wanted!

customer_reviews.title: Great set except quicksilver is blah

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Completely happy with this Marvel Legends set. The new head sculpt of Scarlet Witch is possibly the best female head sculpt. Magneto is an anchor and must have for any X-men fan. Quicksilver is the only slight disappointment the head sculpt is too big and the lightning bolt across the chest has some minor paint flaking issues. 9/10

customer_reviews.title: Watch for it to go on sale
customer_reviews.text: Got on sale and at $13 a figure, it was a great deal. Nice sculpts and paint jobs.

customer_reviews.text: Awesome set. The quicksilver figure is pretty lame but this is the best magneto to date. Scarlett witch is a nice piece as well!

customer_reviews.title: A Complicated but Not-Canonical Family
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack almost exclusively for the awesome Jim Lee style Magneto. I was also excited for Quicksilver to add to my 90's X-Factor lineup. But never did I expect to fall in love with the awesome Scarlet Witch figure. A solid three-pack, especially for the sale price!

customer_reviews.title: Family DOES Matter
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set. Quicksilver to help fill out my classic X-Factor team, a waaaay better version of Scarlet Witch to go along with my Avengers and FINALLY the Master of Magnetism himself, MAGNETO! A long overdue beautifully made figure that I am ecstatic to finally own.

customer_reviews.title: The head on Quicksilver is out of scale!!!

Magneto’s helmet is too short, his jaw line shows below it but I can fix that. Scarlett Witch is best of the three. Overall, I am disappointed with this Marvel Legends set.

product_meta.title: Marvel Legends Series 6" Family Matters 3 Pack with Magneto, Quicksilver, & Scarlet Witch Action Figures (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description:
Magneto forms The Brotherhood of mutants to combat anti-mutant Sentiment, but the organization turns into a family matter when he recruits his twin super-powered children, Quicksilver and Scarlet witch to help him carry out his terrorizing agenda. 

with over 80 years of comic book history, Marvel has become a cornerstone of fan collections around the world. With the Marvel Legends series, fan-favorite Marvel comic universe and Marvel Cinematic universe characters are designed with premium detail and articulation for top-of-the-line poseable and displayable collectibles. From figures to vehicles to premium role-play items, The Marvel Legends series offers elite character-inspired product for Marvel fans and collectors of all ages.

these 6-inch Magneto, Quicksilver, and Scarlet witch figures are highly articulated and feature classic Marvel designs, making them worthy additions to the Marvel Legends series. 

copyright 2018 Marvel. Copyright 2018 cpii

hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: 6-Inch scale collectible Magneto, Quicksilver, and Scarlet witch: revel in the momentous showdown between the X-Men and their most formidable adversaries yet: Magneto, and the dynamic brother-sister duo, Quicksilver and Scarlet witch, with these 6-inch scale figures.
Marvel comic book character-inspired: this Marvel Legends series action figure 3-pack includes Magneto, Quicksilver, Scarlet witch with classic comic book inspired deco and accessories.

Premium articulation and detailing: Featuring premium deco and multiple points of articulation for high pose ability, fans and collectors can display the Marvel Legends series Magneto, Quicksilver, and Scarlet witch in their collection to recreate scenes from Marvel Comics.

Marvel universe in 6-inch scale: Look for other Marvel Legends series figures, (each sold separately) including Captain America, Iron Man, Thor, and more, to build a Marvel Legends figure collection worthy of recognition. (Additional figures each sold separately. Subject to availability).
For any product related queries contact_us on: [1-800-255-5516]
